#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=On taxation
#Text=HAVE YOUR SAY
#Text=Would Donald K. Allen be a good president ?
#Text=Add or view comments
#Text=What will taxes be like if you become president ?
#Text=Both Senators Obama and McCain are talking about tax breaks .
#Text=The Tax Code is already 67,000 pages thick and nobody understands it .
#Text=Just dump it in favor of The Fair Tax Bill , which will repeal the 16th Amendment and do away with federal income tax .

#Text=In its place will be a National Sales Tax of roughly 18 to 23 percent on all new products , but I would not tax food or medicine and not give out a monthly " prebate , " which is included in the current Fair Tax structure .
#Text=With wage earners keeping 25 to 35 percent of their income instead of the government taking it in income tax , the 18 to 23 percent will be more than affordable .
#Text=On immigration
#Text=What do you believe should happen to illegal immigrants in the United States ?
#Text=Regardless of what country they come from , they should return to their home countries .
#Text=There are thousands of people around the world who are waiting for their legal immigration procedures to be finalized .
#Text=Why should they have to wait sometimes years before being allowed into the USA when others just walk in ?
#Text=Return home and file for immigration the legal way .
#Text=No amnesty .
#Text=What do you believe should be done to secure the borders with Canada and Mexico ?
#Text=We should complete a secure border fence on our southern border .
#Text=It will not be 100 percent effective , but people who live on our borders where there are fences will tell you that they do work .
#Text=Supplement the fence with unmanned aerial surveillance , infrared and motion detectors , and increased security personnel , and it will cut illegal immigration 95 plus percent .
#Text=What do you believe the guidelines on allowing immigrants into the US should be ?
#Text=Our immigration laws are sufficient .
#Text=They simply need to be enforced .
#Text=Follow the laws we have ; they 've worked for over 230 years .
#Text=They worked for my maternal grandparents , who immigrated from Lithuania around 1900 .
#Text=On foreign policy
#Text=What do you believe the government policy on war should be ?
#Text=Declaration of war should reside solely with Congress .
#Text=The President is allowed some leeway in small conflicts that require immediate action .
#Text=We should primarily be noninterventionist , but not isolationist .
#Text=In nearly every foreign conflict , it should be up to the United Nations to decide on military intervention , but we all know how ineffective the UN has been .
#Text=Why did the UN allow Idi Amin to slaughter his people , or the genocide in Darfur ?
#Text=The whole world looks upon the UN as a paper tiger .
